import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List asset types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the catalog of asset types available in the tenant (e.g., Devices, Peripherals, Network Equipment). Asset types define categorization for inventory management.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-types) to retrieve available categories.
2. Extract `Items[].AssetTypeId` for the desired category.
3. Use the `AssetTypeId` when creating assets via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/new](/docs/api/assets/create-asset) or filtering via [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets).

**Common Use Cases**
- Populate asset type dropdowns in forms
- Filter assets by category in reports
- Bootstrap data for asset import workflows

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

</ParamsDetails>
